title: Roku, DraftKings, Cognex, Shake Shack: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Roku’s outlook disappointed investors; DraftKings reported a loss that widened from a year ago
body:
Stock futures are up, but major indexes remain on track for weekly losses amid fears of war in Ukraine. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
